name: libreutils
description: A privacy-first collection of useful web tools that run entirely in your browser

scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run build:tools && bun run build:web
scripts.build:web: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target browser --minify && cp ./src/index.html ./dist/ && cp -r ./public/* ./dist/ && cat ./shared/src/styles/variables.css ./shared/src/styles/base.css ./shared/src/styles/components.css > ./dist/styles.css
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules shared/node_modules tools/*/node_modules dist shared/dist tools/*/dist
